divs: sighting detailsi justed got home and it was at night so i sat down on my front stairs of my house and talked on the phone and time went by i got tired and hanged up the phone and as soon i got of the phone i herd this tip of weird havering tip air nose so i looked to my left hand side and saw a super big all black triangle and it seem to have sum tip of tinted windows on it and had yellowish lights turning on one by one in a straight line after the line lighted up the next row of lines start up in the same pattern but different rows it had about 5 rows and after all the 5 rows lit up the first row that went on now seem to turn off one by one it was just to true to be true it was heading tors the mall so i said to my self the police will see that [cms\tg\pd] or sum one will but now one saw what i seen because the wasn't any reports about it so now i am reporting what i saw it was flying super slow but fast in the same time so weird to me it was flying over my nabers houses a cross the street the craziest thing was i told my sister what had happened and she believed me kinda but every month i would remind her what i have had seen but the year went by and guss what happened!!!!!!! i mention what i seen again guss what!!!!!!! my sister read the news paper that same day and!!!!! the same exact object i seen was seen in texas and it was a year later now !!!!! a lot of people seen what i seen so theres my evidence in the news paper it headed to texas but my question y?!!!!!! when i first seen it i didn't know what to think but in my state of mind i felt like there was sum one looking at me from that weird ufo triangle thing ....... the only reason i lost site of the plane because theres a free way bridge covering the other side it was heading i felt so weird to see such a thing!!
Summary: ALL BLACK SUPER BIG TRIANGLE WITH YELLOW LIGHT TURNING ON ONE BY ONE
